name: overload_disassembly
description:
For #minijam100 - you're being terminated from all further activities. Permanently.

Use the ARROW KEYS to move. Use SPACE to interact with things, and to scream.

Stack at least seven (7) status effects to overload your Personal Alertness Chip: this will cause it to send out an overriding distress signal to let you escape your cruel, capitalist captors before your contract and lease on life is permanently terminated.

Thank you for playing ♥

JAM NOTES::: Initially, I had 15 possible status effects, but there was no time to create enough assets to implement all of them, which is why the room looks large and empty. Chairs to push around, tables to get stuck onand other room-like features have given way for the bare essentials. I also wanted to make each playthrough randomized by switching object placements around and changing up the over-the-top deaths, but did not have time. Maybe some other time!
